description:
A better radiation detector would be the HF35C EMF Meter, which I’ll be using soon, but I appreciate these folks efforts! •

We The People have the last say. 
We either tacitly accept our rights being stripped or we defend them, from all enemies, foreign & domestic. •

@thetruthaboutai:

The video is of a shuffle site in downtown Calgary at BrookfieldPlace that includes #Huawei facial recognition camera and 5G small cell antennas.⁣ •
⁣
During the coronavirus lockdown, 5G infrastructure is being deployed across Canada.⁣ •
⁣
NCA took EMF readings at the shuffle site, and they more than quadrupled the safe level of below 0.50 V/m. ⁣ ⁣
We recorded readings of 2.55 V/m.⁣ •
⁣
Brookfield is a multi-billion dollar worldwide  corporation. One of it’s subsidiaries is called Brookfield Infrastructure Partners: owns and operates a worldwide network of infrastructure companies in utilities, transportation, energy and communications infrastructure. It invests in transmission and telecommunication lines, toll roads, ports and pipelines.⁣ •
⁣
The federal government, including Industry Canada and Health Canada, ignore the non-thermal health effects of EMF #radiation. These health effects are well documented by over 2,000 scientific studies.⁣ RP: @youcantstopthetruth •
